origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'AutoLoan.get_loan_details', 'description': 'Get detailed information about a car loan.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'car_model', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The model of the car.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'details', 'description': 'A dictionary containing details about the car loan.'}]}, {'name': 'AutoLoan.get_required_insurance', 'description': 'Get the required insurance type and coverage for a car loan.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'car_model', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The model of the car.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'insurance', 'description': 'A dictionary containing the required insurance type and coverage.'}]}, {'name': 'AutoLoan.compare_insurance_policies', 'description': 'Compare different insurance policies based on premiums and terms.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'car_model', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The model of the car.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'comparison', 'description': 'A list of dictionaries containing details about different insurance policies.'}]}, {'name': 'AutoLoan.get_financial_advice', 'description': 'Get financial advice on choosing an insurance policy.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'car_model', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The model of the car.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'advice', 'description': 'A dictionary containing financial advice on insurance policies.'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
获取Toyota Camry的汽车贷款详情。接下来，查询Toyota Camry贷款所需的保险类型和覆盖范围。然后，比较不同保险方案的保费和条款。最后，获取一些关于Toyota Camry保险选择的金融建议。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取Toyota Camry的汽车贷款详情。
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'car_model'的值是什么?
